title: For Sale: T206 Slight Miscut Back - Jack White (Buffalo)
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Slight Miscut Back - Jack White (Buffalo)
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a T206 Jack White with a slight miscut Piedmont back........$65 (delivered).

Nice card with no creases, grading in the Vg/Ex range with two corners with touches and two with slight wear.  Paypal, check, or money order all work for me.  Thank you for looking at my auctions!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=57951&d=1330484976[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=57952&d=1330484986[/IMG]

Lovely Day...

Bumped with a Price Adjustment.
